effects: Increase all stats by 100% for 3 turns to all allies while singing
Restore 1150 (+8x, Heal) HP split over 3 turns to all allies while singing
Restore 20 (+0.5x, Heal) MP split over 3 turns to all allies while singing
name: Hero's Rime
Hero's Rime
英雄之歌
영웅의 노래
Aria héroïque
Heldenlied
Aria heroica
desc_short: Boost ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR for all allies while singing, and gradually restore HP and MP
歌唱期間提高全體隊員攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值+持續恢復HPMP
노래하는 동안 아군 전체의 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 상승+HP와 MP 서서히 회복
Augmente l'ATT, la DEF, la MAGIE et la PSY de tous les alliés en chantant, et restaure progressivement les PV et les PM
ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY hoch, alle Verb. während Lied, ern. alle LP+MP.
Aumenta ATQ/DEF/MAG a aliados y recupera VIT/PM mientras canta
desc_long: Boosts ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR and restores HP and MP for all allies while singing.
歌唱期間提高全體隊員攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值並持續恢復HPMP。
노래하는 동안 아군 전체의 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 상승하고 HP와 MP가 서서히 회복합니다.
Augmente l'ATT, la DEF, la MAGIE et la PSY de tous les alliés en chantant, et restaure progressivement les PV et les PM
ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY hoch und heilt LP und MP, alle Verb. während das Lied andauert.
Aumenta ATQ/DEF/MAG a aliados y recupera VIT/PM mientras canta
